original_title: Remembering iconic murdered journalist Lasantha Wickrematunge
original_body_lines: The 15th anniversary commemoration of the assassination of The Sunday Leader Founder, Editor-in-Chief Lasantha Wickrematunge was marked yesterday at his grave. Family, friends, former colleagues, and others gathered at Borella cemetery to commemorate and remember Lasantha Wickrematunge – Pic by Ruwan Walpola
